name: AMERICAN SUPPRESSOR ASSOCIATION
description: Advocate for the interests of suppressor manufacturers, distributors, dealers & consumers
sampleDescriptions: Educate about the benefits of the use of suppressors and advocate for legislative reforms, including, H.R.367/S.59, the "Hearing Protection Act of 2017" and H.R. 3668, the "SHARE Act."
